meta.title: Home - Pine Lake Prep

body.class: fsLiveMode fsHasHeader fsHasMenu fsHasFooter fsHasOneColumnLayout home grayscale fsHasTheme2

p.strong: Serving K-12 students in the Lake Norman and surrounding areas.

div.class: fsElement fsResourceElement fsSlideshow main-slideshow fsSlideshowHorizontal fsStatePlaying

img.alt: group photo of students in STEM building
AP World History investigates %22cause of death%22 of great empires

div.p: Click here for commonly used links, such as MyPaymentsPlus and Canvas.
Game schedules, forms and Boosters Info.
Pine Lake Preparatory prepares students for college and purposeful lives.
Learn more about the PLP Board of Directors and access meeting minutes.
Learn more about what it means to be a member of the Pine Lake Prep Pride!
Get Involved! We always need volunteers to make our events happen!

section.class: fsElement fsPostElement fsGrid news-panel fsThumbnailOriginal fsThumbnailMedium fsItemCount_4

img.alt: summer camps at PLP screen shot

div.p: Click for a sneak preview of the themed camps offered this summer! Registration will open February 8th through MyPaymentsPlus. Please contact Susan York with any questions. In addition to these camps, we are still offering full day Lions Den camp. See details on MyPaymentsPlus.

article.a: Read More about PLP Summer Camps

div.a: Pine Lake Prep Earns an "A" from School Board

img.alt: Lottery presents checks to PLP and Mr. Walker

div.a: Mr. Walker Named North Carolina School Hero

div.p: Mr. Jeff Walker, Pine Lake Engineering teacher, received a $10,000 prize from the N.C. Education Lottery, for being one of 10 School Heroes.

article.a: Read More about Mr. Walker Named North Carolina School Hero
